name: Duoswitch
description:
Do you want to try the game without having to download it? Play it on the browser! (the browser version has a lot of audio delay)

----------

Turn off all the green lights! Duoswitch is a tile-based puzzle game in which you have to click on tiles to get the best score. Green lights add one point and red lights make the score decrease by two. When a tile is clicked, horizontal and vertical directions are randomly set to generate more tiles in the next turn. But be careful! If one of the lights reaches the barrier, you will lose!

----------

Controls (TIC-80/keyboard):

A/Z - Click

B/X - Use special power (sets the center tile to green)

Mouse - Move

----------

Interface:

1UP - Score

Back - Reset game

Next - Tile generator direction

Special - Remaining special moves
